channel.title: From the blog
channel.description: Learnings, recommendations & new features from ServiceStack engineers

item.title: Complete Admin UI Management for Identity Claims and Roles
item.author: demis@servicestack.com (Demis Bellot)
item.description: With support for adding Roles and User and Role Claims, the built-in Admin UI now offers complete Identity Auth management

item.title: In Depth and Interactive API Analytics available to all ServiceStack Apps
item.author: demis@servicestack.com (Demis Bellot)
item.description: Comprehensive and Interactive API Analytics in Admin UI offering deep insights into API usage, performance, users, API Keys & IPs.

item.title: llms.txt and llms-full.txt support for Razor SSG and Razor Press
item.author: demis@servicestack.com (Demis Bellot)
item.description: Free Razor SSG and Razor Press Static Site Templates now auto generates llms.txt and llms-full.txt files for Large Language Models

item.title: Generate CRUD APIs and Admin UIs from existing DBs
item.author: demis@servicestack.com (Demis Bellot)
item.description: Use the metadata from an existing RDBMS to generate AutoQuery CRUD APIs and Admin UIs for managing your data.

item.title: FREE CLI Access to the worlds most popular AI Models
item.author: demis@servicestack.com (Demis Bellot)
item.description: No API Keys, no Signups, just free access to the worlds most popular AI Large Language Models

item.title: New okai tool for Rapid App Development
item.author: demis@servicestack.com (Demis Bellot)
item.description: Explore the new okai tool and workflow for rapidly developing Blazor Vue Crud Apps with AI and TypeScript Data Models

item.title: Text to Blazor Vue CRUD Apps
item.author: demis@servicestack.com (Demis Bellot)
item.description: Discover how to quickly generate Blazor Admin CRUD Apps from a text description using the new okai tool

item.title: Self Hosted AI Server for LLMs, Ollama, Comfy UI & FFmpeg
item.author: demis@servicestack.com (Demis Bellot)
item.description: Introducing AI Server - an OSS Self Hosted Gateway for running LLM, Ollama, Media and Comfy UI APIs

item.title: .NET 8 Templates migrated to use Kamal for deployments
item.author: darren@servicestack.com (Darren Reid)
item.description: All Identity Auth templates now use Kamal for deployments, simplifying the process of deploying .NET Apps to any Linux server.

item.title: DTOs in all languages downloadable without .NET
item.author: demis@servicestack.com (Demis Bellot)
item.description: ServiceStack Typed DTOs for all languages can now be downloaded and uploaded without .NET installed
